abstract: The first few years of my life were hard for my parents.
description: Keith remembers little of his early years - separated from his parents and living with his grandparents. His father had been sent to a Re-education Camp and his mother had moved away. On his father's release from the Camp the family was reunited and several years later they escaped from the hardships of Vietnam to seek a better life in Australia.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001300; Men's voices: Digital Storytelling project (Vietnamese men); Active; 2007
